div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 14:52 pm CDT

div.div: A chance of sprinkles. Partly sunny, with a high near 70. South wind around 10 mph.
A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly between 1am and 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southeast wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
A 10 percent chance of showers before 7am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 78. Southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

a.aria-label: Read more about USD 323 COVID-19 FAQS

span.span: USD 323 is looking to expand Early Learning opportunities in the district. If you have a child that will turn 4 years old by August 31, 2020, and are interested in preschool at Westmoreland or St. George Elementary, please complete the following application. The application does not ensure enrollment. Following the completion of the application, parents will be contacted about the opportunity to enroll. If you have any questions, please call the district office at 785-494-8597.

span.a: USD 323 Application for 4 Year Old Preschool

a.aria-label: Read more about USD 323 Universal Preschool

h3.a: USD 323 Food Service Program During School Closure

span.span: While school is out of session, USD 323 is providing lunch and breakfast to any child age 1-18, at no cost. Pick up locations will be near elementary school entrances for those who live within city limits. For those who reside outside of city limits, arrangements can be made for delivery. Children MUST be present at pick-up or delivery locations. To receive meals, please complete the form below.

span.a: USD 323 Food Service program for children age 1-18

a.aria-label: Read more about USD 323 Food Service Program During School Closure

div.p:
AN Equal Employment/Educational Opportunity Agency
The USD 323 does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin,
sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities. The following person has been
designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies:
Kevin Logan
Superintendent of Schools
9353 Flush Rd
St. George, KS 66535
785-458-9410
Kansas School Safety Hotline
1-877-626-8203
Out-of-District Information
Are you an out-of-district family? Interested in additional information regarding attendance in USD 323? The information you need is....
USD 323 Enrollment Policy
Out-of-District Application Form
If you wish to apply, please complete the application form and return it to the appropriate school. All out-of-district students/families must reapply each year.

h3.a: Maps and Directions to Rock Creek Schools

div.p:
District Office and Westmoreland Elementary School
From Manhattan
Take Highway 24 east and travel about 4 miles
Turn left on Flush Road and travel about15 miles
Stay on Flush Road until it becomes Main Street
Turn right on Third Street and travel two blocks
These two buildings are across the street from each other
From the North
Take Highway 99 south until you reach Westmoreland
Turn right on Main Street
Turn left on Third Street and travel two blocks
These two buildings are . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Maps and Directions to Rock Creek Schools

div.p:
Our Mission The purpose of the Rock Creek Booster Club is to support and promote school-related activities of all Rock Creek Junior-Senior High School students. Along with offering support to our athletic teams and club activities (both extracurricular and co-curricular), we also help to meet general school needs.
2018 - 2019 List of Activities Supported
Fundraising The Rock Creek Booster Cub raises funds primarily through memberships and apparel sales.
How to Join All are welcome to get involved in the Rock Creek Booster Club. . . .
